name: Gainforce
overview: For a long time you were the most successful double-agent between the pirates and the Federation. Now the Federation has discovered your crimes and you are fugitive. You flee to the pirates, but they throw you out! You have only two opportunities: get imprisoned or fight for your rehabilitation. You steal a little fighter of the R11 class and a laser-gun and fight for the Federation without order! Be careful: the whole universe will be on your heels.
